title: Pixel 3 camera not working with third party apps until a phone restart
content:
This just started after the aug 1 update. My pixel 3 camera, front facing only, is crashing after taking about 3 pictures with third party apps. After a phone reboot it works again but only for 3-4 pictures with third party apps.

The selfie camera does not encounter this issue.

When attempting to take a picture with a third party app the screen will remain black for about 20 seconds and the app will crash. On re-oppening of the app it will state "camera in use by another application"
Reboot fixes this issue.

Safe mode does not fix this issue, factory reset does not fix this issue.

Thanks,
Dan
